attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of being able to support the absolute gem that the president of the beloved USA is...and was met with downright blasphemous results!!!!!! DONALD TRUMP IS A WHITE SUPREMACIST 😱😱😨 Mr. Poopy pAnts Toddler Man doesn’t know what he’s doing and it clearly shows through his own rundown app!!!!!! I am enRAGED!!! 😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: White Supremacy??? 😱😱

attributes.review: This app was almost as gross and disappointing as him as a person but he’s set the bar of being that bad way too high for anything else to reach
attributes.title: Disappointed & disgusted

attributes.review: This app is dumb and a waste of time. ALL PRESIDENTS MATTER. When will he learn that nobody likes him. He needs to just give up. He is to old for the bs he is doing. He’s closer to 100 than 50. Who wants a zombie for president? #NoMoreTrump #Anonymous2020 #NickiforPresident #f12 #yamama
attributes.title: Just no

attributes.review:
so i see that bunker boy has an app now🧚✨💗congrats💞
Overall i would like to give this app zero stars just from opening it.... but again, congrats on the app bunker boy💓🧚
attributes.title: well look what we have here

attributes.review: WORST GAME EVER 😡 i thought this was a fun game but no all I saw was the most scariest and terrifying face ever, TRUMP his face literally gave me nightmares NEVER WILL I DOWNLOAD THIS GAME EVER AGAIN. I still have nightmares just by seeing his face. I feel bad for the people who support him. get help 🥰
attributes.title: ABC it’s easy as 123
attributes.userName: i only said the truth LeL

attributes.review:
I would rate this app a negative 1 billion even more!!!!! This app is horrible just like our president a fat, ugly, racist, rapists, pedophilia…Trump. This app should be taken down form the App Store just like Trump. That piece of Cheeto will not win.🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
Trump 2020 🧚🏻🧚🏾‍♂️🤪😇🙃😉😍😍😊✌️on a gravestone.
#savebarrontrump.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: this app is the worst app made in history. it made my mom have a stroke. it threw my grandpa across the street. AND the worst of all, the app smells disgusting. i suggest you leave a one star rating on this app. thank you ❤️ #dumptrump
attributes.title: i hate it 🤮🤮

attributes.review: The app is very hard to use. It was very confusing. It glitches when you tap the app back to your home screen!!! Do Not download, it is a waste of time 🧚🏼‍♀️✨
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: 🧚✨🎶𝓣𝓪𝓴𝓮 𝓽𝓱𝓲𝓼 𝓪𝓹𝓹 𝓸𝓯𝓯 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓪𝓹𝓹 𝓼𝓽𝓸𝓻𝓮, 𝓽𝓪𝓴𝓮 𝓲𝓽 𝓸𝓯𝓯 𝓻𝓲𝓰𝓱𝓽 𝓪𝔀𝓪𝔂. 𝓣𝓱𝓲𝓼 𝓶𝓪𝓷𝓼 𝓪 𝓭𝓲𝓼𝓬𝓻𝓼𝓮 𝓽𝓸 𝓽𝓱𝓲𝓼 𝓬𝓸𝓾𝓷𝓽𝓻𝔂. 𝓜𝓪𝓴𝓮 𝓱𝓲𝓶 𝓰𝓸 𝓪𝔀𝓪𝔂. 𝓦𝓮 𝓭𝓸𝓷𝓽 𝓰𝓲𝓿𝓮 𝓪 𝓯𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓽𝓱𝓪𝓽 𝓱𝓮𝓼 𝓸𝓾𝓻 𝓹𝓻𝓮𝓼𝓲𝓭𝓮𝓷𝓽, 𝓱𝓮𝓼 𝓪𝓷 𝓪𝓬𝓽𝓾𝓪𝓵 𝓸𝓻𝓪𝓷𝓰𝓮. 𝓕𝓸𝓻 𝓪 𝓶𝓪𝓷 𝓻𝓾𝓷𝓷𝓲𝓷𝓰 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓬𝓸𝓾𝓷𝓽𝓻𝔂, 𝓱𝓮 𝓼𝓱𝓸𝓾𝓵𝓭 𝓴𝓷𝓸𝔀 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓪𝓷𝓽𝓱𝓮𝓶. 𝓛𝓮𝓽𝓼 𝓷𝓸𝓽 𝓯𝓸𝓻𝓰𝓮𝓽 𝓽𝓸 𝓶𝓮𝓷𝓽𝓲𝓸𝓷, 𝓱𝓮 𝓻𝓪𝓹𝓮𝓭 𝓪 𝓬𝓱𝓲𝓵𝓭. 𝓢𝓪𝓲𝓭 𝓱𝓮 𝔀𝓸𝓾𝓵𝓭 𝓭𝓪𝓽𝓮 𝓱𝓲𝓼 𝓭𝓸𝓾𝓰𝓱𝓽𝓮𝓻, 𝓲𝓯 𝓽𝓱𝓮𝔂 𝔀𝓮𝓻𝓷'𝓽 𝓻𝓮𝓪𝓵𝓪𝓽𝓮𝓭. 𝓘 𝓭𝓸𝓷𝓽 𝓴𝓷𝓸𝔀 𝓪𝓫𝓸𝓾𝓽 𝔂𝓸𝓾, 𝓫𝓾𝓽 𝓽𝓱𝓲𝓼 𝓶𝓪𝓷 𝓲𝓼 𝓪 𝓬𝓻𝓮𝓮𝓹. 𝓣𝓪𝓴𝓮 𝓱𝓲𝓼 𝓪𝓹𝓹 𝓸𝓯𝓯 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓪𝓹𝓹 𝓼𝓽𝓸𝓻𝓮, 𝔀𝓮 𝓪𝓵𝓵 𝔀𝓪𝓷𝓽 𝓱𝓲𝓶 𝓽𝓸 𝓼𝓵𝓮𝓮𝓮𝓮𝓮𝓮𝓮𝓮𝓮𝓮𝓹. 🎶(𝓯𝓸𝓻 𝓪 𝔀𝓱𝓲𝓵𝓮)✨🧚SING IT WITH ME!!✨🧚🌸
attributes.title: 🧚✨𝓐 𝓼𝓸𝓷𝓰✨🧚

attributes.review: i downloaded the app hoping to be informed about our president but it’s an awful app. Asked for my email and phone number and always spammed me 😑😑 Super slow and glitched a lot. I DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.title: horrible, awful
